content: this pattern is one of four crochet halloween keychain patterns which can also be used as bag charms this set was originally released in 3 parts as the fourteenth weekend mystery crochet along with underground crafter 1 **finished size** 1 5 4 cm diameter after stuffing **materials for halloween character buddies ** big twist petite 2 yarn 100% acrylic 1 41 oz/40 g 87 yd/80 m 1 skein each in black ca orange bright cb slime cc and ivory cd *or approximately 87 yd 80 m each in black/dark gray orange green and white/off-white in any medium weight yarn * us size e-4/3 5 mm crochet hook *or any size needed to obtain correct gauge * locking stitch markers yarn needle fiber filling safety eyes 4 pairs i used 3 pairs of 6mm black round eyes and 1 pair of 12mm green cat safety eyes keyring with lobster clasp 4 sets similar in style to these 3 the black cat buddy uses 1 skein each big twist petite yarn 100% acrylic 1 41 oz/40 g 87 yd/80 m in black ca and orange bright cb *or approximately 20 yd 18 5 m in ca and 10 yd 9 m in cb in any medium weight yarn* and 1 pair of 12 mm green cat safety eyes **gauge** *exact gauge is not critical for this pattern stitches should be small so fiber filling doesn t show * 1 https //undergroundcrafter com/2022/01/28/weekend-mystery-crochet-alongs/ 2 https //prf hn/l/gx11qa3 3 https //prf hn/l/qljjnrd
